<h3 id="X34626">X(34626) = CENTER OF THE HR-ELLIPSE OF THESE TRIANGLES: 2nd CIRCUMPERP TANGENTIAL TO ABC-X3 REFLECTIONS</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 7*a^4-(5*b^2+4*b*c+5*c^2)*a^2+2*(b+c)*b*c*a-2*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(34626) = 7*X(3)-4*X(24387) = 2*X(20)+X(3913) = 3*X(376)-X(34625) = 4*X(550)-X(12513) = X(1657)+2*X(8715) = 5*X(3522)-2*X(3813) = 3*X(3534)-X(34740) = 3*X(4421)-X(34739) = 3*X(11194)-2*X(34625) = 7*X(11235)-8*X(24387) = 3*X(11236)-2*X(34739) = X(22560)-4*X(24466) = X(34620)+2*X(34707) = 3*X(34620)-2*X(34740) = 3*X(34707)+X(34740)</b>
<p>
The center of the reciprocal HR-ellipse of these triangles is X(34625)</p>
<p>X(34626) lies on these lines:
{2,3847}, {3,11235}, {20,529}, {30,4421}, {35,17532}, {55,17579}, {56,20066}, {100,31141}, {104,376}, {381,24042}, {474,4330}, {515,34717}, {516,34647}, {517,34743}, {519,3534}, {527,34638}, {535,15681}, {542,34732}, {545,24683}, {550,12513}, {551,5880}, {958,15338}, {1125,19706}, {1158,28204}, {1376,4302}, {1657,8715}, {3058,22768}, {3189,28610}, {3241,3474}, {3434,31157}, {3522,3813}, {3524,3829}, {3529,12607}, {3582,19705}, {3654,34700}, {3679,4640}, {3880,34716}, {4188,9670}, {4294,25524}, {4297,10912}, {4316,34690}, {4324,5687}, {4428,11112}, {4857,19537}, {4995,10953}, {5010,31159}, {5560,19875}, {5853,34646}, {5884,34710}, {6154,8168}, {6925,13272}, {6938,34697}, {7354,11239}, {8666,15696}, {9671,17566}, {9689,19030}, {9710,17576}, {9778,34744}, {10860,34628}, {11001,34619}, {11238,13587}, {11496,28452}, {13996,31145}, {15326,20075}, {15678,18253}, {17549,31140}, {19924,34680}, {25439,34637}</p>
<p>
X(34626) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {20, 34607}, {3189, 28610}, {3534, 34707}, {11001, 34619}<br>
X(34626) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3913, 34607), (11194, 376), (11235, 3), (11236, 4421), (34620, 3534), (34700, 3654), (34706, 2)<br>
</p>
